original_title: En ligne de mire - comment filmer la guerre ?
overview: Documentary about war movies seen through the eyes of French directors, such as Bertrand Tavernier, Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Bruno Dumont, Florent Emilio-Siri... They explain how they perceive this film genre and how they used this subject in their films.
title: En ligne de mire - comment filmer la guerre ?
